text: KOOZ (94.1 FM) is a radio station licensed to Myrtle Point, Oregon. The station is owned by Southern Oregon University, and is an affiliate of Jefferson Public Radio, airing JPR's "Classics & News" service, consisting of news and classical music programming. ==External links== *ijpr.org OOZ Category:Classical music radio stations in the United States Category:NPR member stations Category:Coos County, Oregon Category:Southern Oregon University Category:Radio stations established in 1998 Category:1998 establishments in Oregon
title: KOOZ
